resources.subTitle: Introduction to computer
resources.description: A computer is an electronic devices that takes input in the form of data and information, process it, gives meaningful output and store it. Computers are everywhere at school, home, bank, supermarket etc. The parts of a computer include the monitor, which displays information; the keyboard, which is used to type; the mouse, which is used to click; and the computer itself, which houses the computer's components.

resources.title: Turn on/off computer
resources.description: A computer is an electronic devices that takes input in the form of data and information, process it, gives meaningful output and store it. Computers are everywhere at school, home, bank, supermarket etc. The parts of a computer include the monitor, which displays information; the keyboard, which is used to type; the mouse, which is used to click; and the computer itself, which houses the computer's components.

subPoints.subpointDescription: Step 1: Check the computer is connected to the power supply(main plug) and main plug is ON.
Step 2: Find the ON/OFF button on the computer system and push the button.
Step 3: Switch ON the monitor incase it is OFF.
